title: Kit Kat bars are the most influential candy bars? Really?
contentencoded:
Frankly, I've got a quibble or two.

Time went out and interviewed "candy experts" to figure out which are the most influential candy bars of all times.

First of all, what?

Second of all, how do they only rank Snickers number 5?

And finally, Kit Kat comes out on top?

Scraping pretty low for things to name "whatever of the year," aren't you, Time?
